title: The Elsewhere
description: Voices that know your deepest secrets...An asylum cut off from the world...A man who's made it his home...Victor Strasz hears voices, but they can’t find him in The Elsewhere. They can't control him anymore, and they can't make him hurt any more people. Beneath the ground and behind the concrete walls, Victor is safe from the world, and the world is safe from him.But when Victor finds the body of a murdered man, deep within The Elsewhere where he can’t possibly exist, his faith in his sanctuary is shaken. And when that man creeps into his mind and begins to speak, Victor discovers that the place in which he found his safety might well be where he’s in the greatest danger.WHAT WOULD YOU SACRIFICE TO STAY SAFE?The Elsewhere is a tense, claustrophobic thriller that is perfect for fans of Stephen King and Lauren Beukes.
author: Alex Delve
